question:
Which of the following rulers founded the Sangama dynasty?
1) Harihara IÂ 
2) Bukka Raya I
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Harihara I and Bukka Raya I are considered as the Founders of the Sangama dynasty of Vijayanagar kingdom. They established the first dynasty of Vijayanagar kingdom in 1336. They were originally feudatories of the Kakatiyas of Warangal.
